thread.title: Instagram launches Boomerang App stitches photos together to create a looping shot thats a cross between a GIF and a Vine
thread.title_full: Instagram launches Boomerang App stitches photos together to create a looping shot thats a cross between a GIF and a Vine

title: Instagram launches Boomerang App stitches photos together to create a looping shot thats a cross between a GIF and a Vine
text:
Instagram launches Boomerang: App stitches photos together to create a looping shot that's a cross between a GIF and a Vine 
Daily Mail Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Today, Instagram is adding another option to this mix with an app called Boomerang - a cross between a GIF and a Vine that loops forwards and backwards.??...
